Text: Regarding the question 'It will broke my permanent activation of W8? The answer is: YES (or, at least, perhaps)! Running KMSELDI.exe (after decompress all the stuff inside the file), my Windows 8 activation got from Microsoft was GONE. I have to call MS to reactivate it.
Downloaded today, tried today on 2 pcs and it's working so far. I got the 180 days message when i ran the Check_Activation_All.cmd. Thanks
